verses.text: \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* this \w word|strong="H1697"\w* that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* against you, O \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, against the whole \w family|strong="H4940"\w* which I brought \w up|strong="H5927"\w* from the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

You only have I \w known|strong="H3045"\w* of all the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0127"\w*: therefore I will \w punish|strong="H6485"\w* you for all your \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w*.\f + \fr 3.2 \ft punish: Heb. visit upon\f*
Can \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, \w except|strong="H1115"\w* they be \w agreed|strong="H3259"\w*?

Will a \w lion|strong="H0738"\w* \w roar|strong="H7580"\w* in the \w forest|strong="H3293"\w*, when he hath no \w prey|strong="H2964"\w*? will a young \w lion|strong="H3715"\w* cry \w out|strong="H5414"\w* of his \w den|strong="H4585"\w*, if he have \w taken|strong="H3920"\w* \w nothing|strong="H1115"\w*?\f + \fr 3.4 \ft cry: Heb. give forth his voice\f*

Can a \w bird|strong="H6833"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* in a \w snare|strong="H6341"\w* upon the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, where no \w gin|strong="H4170"\w* \add is\add* for him? shall \add one\add* take \w up|strong="H5927"\w* a \w snare|strong="H6341"\w* from the \w earth|strong="H0127"\w*, and have \w taken|strong="H3920"\w* nothing at \w all|strong="H3920"\w*?

Shall a \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w* be \w blown|strong="H8628"\w* in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* not be \w afraid|strong="H2729"\w*? shall there be \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in a \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath not \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \add it\add*?\f + \fr 3.6 \ft be afraid: or, run together?\f*\f + \fr 3.6 \ft the \+nd LORD\+nd*…: or, shall not the \+nd LORD\+nd* do somewhat?\f*

Surely the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* will \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w nothing|strong="H1697"\w*, but he \w revealeth|strong="H1540"\w* his \w secret|strong="H5475"\w* unto his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*.

The \w lion|strong="H0738"\w* hath \w roared|strong="H7580"\w*, who will \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w*? the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*, who can but \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w*?

¶ \w Publish|strong="H8085"\w* in the \w palaces|strong="H0759"\w* at \w Ashdod|strong="H0795"\w*, and in the \w palaces|strong="H0759"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Assemble|strong="H0622"\w* yourselves upon the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* of \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, and \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* the \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w tumults|strong="H4103"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* thereof, and the \w oppressed|strong="H6217"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* thereof.\f + \fr 3.9 \ft oppressed: or, oppressions\f*

For they \w know|strong="H3045"\w* not to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w right|strong="H5229"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, who \w store|strong="H0686"\w* up \w violence|strong="H2555"\w* and \w robbery|strong="H7701"\w* in their \w palaces|strong="H0759"\w*.\f + \fr 3.10 \ft robbery: or, spoil\f*

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; An \w adversary|strong="H6862"\w* \add there shall be\add* even round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*; and he shall bring \w down|strong="H3381"\w* thy \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* from thee, and thy \w palaces|strong="H0759"\w* shall be \w spoiled|strong="H0962"\w*.

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; As the \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w* taketh \w out|strong="H5337"\w* of the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w lion|strong="H0738"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w legs|strong="H3767"\w*, or a \w piece|strong="H0915"\w* of an \w ear|strong="H0241"\w*; so shall the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* be taken \w out|strong="H5337"\w* that \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* in the \w corner|strong="H6285"\w* of a \w bed|strong="H4296"\w*, and in \w Damascus|strong="H1833"\w* \add in\add* a \w couch|strong="H6210"\w*.\f + \fr 3.12 \ft taketh: Heb. delivereth\f*\f + \fr 3.12 \ft in Damascus…: or, on the bed’s feet\f*

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* ye, and \w testify|strong="H5749"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*,

That in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that I shall \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* the \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* upon him I will also \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* the \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* of \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w*: and the \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* shall be cut \w off|strong="H1438"\w*, and \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* to the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 3.14 \ft visit: or, punish Israel for\f*

And I will \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* the \w winter|strong="H2779"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* with the \w summer|strong="H7019"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; and the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* of \w ivory|strong="H8127"\w* shall \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*, and the \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* shall have an \w end|strong="H5486"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
